ai.summary: A gentle 2.5-km riverside walk along the Brun Valley Greenway in the UK. The route is easy and family-friendly, with flat terrain and pleasant countryside views beside the water.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly flat, surfaced path (tarmac or compact gravel) suitable for walkers of all ages. The route is relatively level with minimal elevation gain; be prepared for mud after rain and occasional shared-use sections with cyclists.
ai.safety_notes: Take weather-appropriate clothing and sturdy footwear. Stay on the designated path, watch for wet or slippery surfaces after rain, and be mindful of other users on a shared-use path. Bring water, a small first-aid kit, and a phone for emergencies. Supervise children and dogs where required.
recommended_gear: Phone with maps or offline access
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn offer the most pleasant walking conditions and scenery; the route can be walked year-round with appropriate wet-weather gear.

seo.title: Brun Valley Greenway – Easy 2.5 km UK Riverside Walk
seo.meta_description: Explore the Brun Valley Greenway, a 2.5 km easy riverside walk in the UK. Flat, family-friendly terrain with practical safety tips and gear suggestions.
